title: Bulbz Tri-Stringer
paragraphs: The Bulbz Tri-Stringer is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is the Emberz-branded variant of the the Tri-Stringer and comes with a different sub and special weapon.
- Promotional artwork for Land vs. Sea vs. Air
The word bulbz is a stylized spelling of the word bulbs.
